entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 15 April 2023
